pr_title: [#10197] Instructor Help Page button text is centre-aligned

timeline.bodyText: What is the reason to have @media here?
timeline.author: Derek-Hardy

replies.bodyText: @media has been removed, initially I thought it should depend on whether it was on screen or not.
replies.author: telvinzhong

timeline.message:
[#10176] Instructor Session Result Page fixes (#10205)

* fixed action button group alignment & bold headers

* bold option header and add spacing

* add table overflow to per question view

* add missing indentation

[#10197] Instructor Help Page button text is centre-aligned

Fixes #10197

Left aligns all text that exceeds the length of the button.

Adds lines for left aligning buttons on the page.
